DOC.brief_title: Stereotactic Radiosurgery Treating Patients With Spinal Metastases
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - To implement CyberKnife® technology improve palliation patient spinal metastasis . - To determine maximum tolerate dose CyberKnife® hypofractionated stereotactic radiosurgery patient . - To evaluate functional diffusion MRI parameter spinal cord tumor treatment Cyberknife® radiosurgery . OUTLINE : Patients undergo placement gold fiducial marker time open surgical resection percutaneous needle biopsy . Patients undergo CyberKnife® hypofractionated stereotactic radiosurgery 30-90 minute daily 2-3 day . Patients undergo functional MRI diffusion tensor image baseline 6 week 6 month completion treatment . Patients also complete pain questionnaire baseline 3 , 6 , 9 , 12 , 18 , 24 month completion treatment . After completion study treatment , patient follow periodically 2 year .
